translation.en: So, we just need to go in for, just, you know...
-You're gonna be okay. -Wait, Kaylie!
Oh, my God. Wesley?
Hey. No. I'm just-- Dude, get your--

translation.en: Enjoy Mexican jail.
-[police siren] -Kaylie! [crying]
Hey! Get out of here! That's not cool! [impact grunts]

Please-- let me just-- It's a misunderstanding.

Señor? Please, sir!
I swear to God, when I get out, I'm gonna take this to social media.

translation.en: Yes, that's why we are here.
That was the plan. But, know what? Now, I don't know, 'cause at least you're contained here.

translation.en: Very funny.
-Sweetie, this is disgusting. -I know.
It is. Don't touch the things.
It was the wildest shit you've seen.

translation.en: -Hello. [scoffs] -What up, Suge Knight?
Wow. I like what you've done with the place.

translation.en: So, you, my friend, are free to go.
-[gasps] Was there a bribe? -Daddy took care of it.

Nolan, Nolan, Nolan.
-That little boy you've been seeing. -Yep. Yeah, the kid who...

translation.en: Sidebar, I did not think that little kid was your type.

translation.en: But apparently, he cares about you so damn much,
translation.it: Ma, a quanto pare, vuole così bene alla sua ragazza

-I'm not his baby. -That little boy loves you.
translation.it: - Non sono la sua ragazza. - Ti ama.

translation.en: I need you to stop talking about Nolan.
-We need to talk. -Oh, thank God.
Remember you told us we should tell you if you were being unreasonable?

translation.en: Look, I know this has been nuts, okay?
translation.it: So che è stata una follia.

translation.en: I can't believe I spent two days trying to break into Jared's room
translation.it: Ho cercato di entrare in camera di Jared per due giorni

translation.en: when all I had to do was tell him
I don't think he should fly alone in his condition,
translation.it: che non è prudente che viaggi solo.

translation.en: wait till he falls asleep on the plane, grab his devices,
translation.it: Si addormenta in aereo, prendo i suoi dispositivi,

translation.en: scan his unconscious face to unlock them, and delete the e-mails.
translation.it: gli scansiono il viso, li sblocco e cancello l'e-mail.

translation.en: -[chuckles] It's, like, so easy. -Wesley, stop.
Can you look at where you are right now. You're in a Mexican jail.

translation.en: What do you want me to do? Dwell on that or rise above it?

translation.en: Dwell on it. Take it in.
This is something you need to process, at the very least for our sanity.

translation.en: Yeah. You are in a relationship
translation.it: Sì. Sei in una relazione in cui menti

translation.en: where you have to lie and pretend all the time.
translation.it: Sì. Sei in una relazione in cui menti e fingi continuamente. È questo che vuoi?

translation.en: Is that something that you really want?
translation.it: e fingi continuamente. È questo che vuoi?

translation.en: Fine. I don't need you guys, okay?

translation.en: -Can we talk about this for a second? -Wesley, you know what?
We love you, but we're done. And you should be done, too.

and we're gonna have a really fantastic day in Mexico.

translation.en: Can we go see Ángel?
Fuck, yeah, we can go see Ángel,

Kaylie...
seriously?
Oh, God.
This was a terrible idea.
Twenty minutes ago, you were so pumped up about this.

What? No.
Kaylie.
This is not happening. Please make it stop. Please.

So selfish.
Okay. What do we think?
So, what's up with this dude? What makes him so...

No-No-No. I'm obviously not describing him right. Um...

I mean, very first time we were together-- sorry, fucking--

translation.en: Candles and flowers.
Wow. Sounds like a Bachelorette episode. [chuckles]

translation.en: No, she, she died.
Oh, my God.
-I'm so sorry. -I'm good.
I'm moving forward. It's been two years. I'm good.

Please, tell me I wasn't your first date.

-Don't go there, okay? -Yeah.
You were totally right. I was in a really bad place that night.

translation.en: No, this is not your fault. This is on me. You know what? I...

Seriously, so sorry.
So, do you wanna, like,

-I don't know them, no. -Not familiar with these blocks.

Hi, Jared.

-Where? -There.

What? Are you okay?
Oh, my God.
Jared. I am so freaking excited to be in Mexico.

Honey, you have to take it easy.

I'll get there as soon as I can,

He just called me his girlfriend! Did you hear that?

Now, you get to tell the kids

I mean, I'm already invested, so...
-to see how this-- -[gasps] Yes!
Oh, my God! [chuckles]
God, this is so good. What is in this tea?

Okay.

translation.en: Hi.
Welcome to the heart sanctuary.

and I just wanna say namaste.

[sighs] How can I help you two?

-Yep, that's her name. -Makes more sense.
-I'm so sorry. -No, you're all good. It's okay.

[chuckles] People like to skate around the subject, you know?

translation.en: -Was she funny? -Oh, yeah.
That was our favorite thing to do, was laugh.
And honestly, that's one of the things that I miss most about her,

translation.en: Oh, my God, yes. The dinner-party glance.

translation.en: -Yes. -When you both clock something insane is happening,

translation.en: -That's my favorite. -Yeah, me too.
-Right? -Yeah.

I am. Why are you so surprised?
-People pay you to give advice? -Yes.
-Wow. -They will when I get a job.
That's pretty cool.

-Sean, his stuff is-- Go! -Okay!
Chill.
I know you're wondering if this is a good idea, and the answer is:

translation.en: -"Please shut up." -Keep it up.
Oh, my God! Learn to drive! Stop!
Jesus.
-You okay? -I'm good. We're okay.
[grunts] It's like the fucking car is giving birth to me.

translation.en: -Oh! -Shit. They're getting away. Come on!
Sean, push the car! That's like 2,000 pounds. You crazy?

translation.en: [sighs] You're doing nothing.
Sean, help me flip the car. Come on!

translation.en: -"Flip the car"? -Yes, people can flip cars
-in moments of crisis. -This is a crisis?

translation.it: Sì, la mia vita privata è in crisi!

translation.en: -Come on. On the count of three. -Okay! Okay, okay.
-Okay. -One, two, three.
-[effort grunts] Fuck! -Fuck.
-Fuck you, jeep! Fuck you! -Hey, chill.
Fuck you, goat!

translation.en: Is this for real?
-And where the hell are we? -I don't know where we are.

translation.en: -We'll figure it out. Hey. -Oh, my God.
translation.it: - Troveremo una soluzione. Ehi. - Oh, mio Dio.

translation.en: Hey, look at me.
We're gonna be fine.
[sighs] What are we gonna do?
[sighs] We walk.
Come on.
We walk.

translation.en: Breathe in. Breathe out.
Feel the softness of the air as it flows through your bodily vessel.

Feel your roots going deep into the earth,
translation.it: Senti le tue radici affondare nella terra,

You can just cut the crap, right now.
Just drop the act 'cause I know you're just a Goop wannabe.

but see, I don't charge people for my magical pearls of wisdom.

Unbroken eye contact is a particular kind of torture.

translation.en: Okay, this is gonna sound strange,
-very strange, but... -Okay.
...kicking it with you has kind of been the best part of my trip.

translation.en: -That's very weird. -Yeah.
[chuckles] Very weird fit.
Not for me. But eventually, I followed my passion, and...

I don't know what to do.
Come on, now, Wes,
eventually you'll find that one place that appreciates you for you.

[sighs] Don't worry so much, Wes.
The world will catch up to you.
Wait, wait, wait.
Oh, my God. Is that the van?
That van has Jared's bag in it.

translation.en: He's playing in a band?

translation.en: Eden Williams. Sent her boyfriend a topless pic, and then...

translation.en: he forwarded it to the entire lacrosse team.
translation.it: che l'ha inoltrata alla squadra di lacrosse.

translation.en: -Hi, Eden. -Hey.
-If you need me to, I can-- -I got this.
No. Technology mishaps are kinda my thing.
translation.it: I problemi tecnologici sono la mia specialità.

translation.en: Thank you so much.
It's okay. Are you okay?
It's not a big deal.
My friends are just jealous that I have a boyfriend and they don't.
translation.it: Le amiche sono gelose, io ho il ragazzo e loro no.

translation.en: Do you wanna know something about love? It can be fucked up!
translation.it: Vuoi sapere qualcosa sull'amore? Può essere un gran rottura di palle!

translation.en: Don't tell anyone I said "fuck."
Yeah, I followed a dude to Mexico.
translation.it: Sì, ho seguito un tizio in Messico.

translation.en: I got arrested and electrocuted, and I'm currently not with this person.
translation.it: Sono stata arrestata e folgorata, e al momento non sto nemmeno con lui.

translation.en: But your friends?
They're the ones who can help keep your head on straight.
translation.it: Sono loro che ti aiutano a stare a galla.

translation.en: 'Cause they know you, they're looking out for you.
Trust me, boyfriends come and go, but if you're lucky enough to have great friends,
translation.it: Fidati, i ragazzi vanno e vengono, ma se hai grandi amiche,

translation.en: I would hold on to that.
What about you?
Do you have that?
Hey, Brooke. It's Wes. Um...
[smacks lips] I just...
I just wanted to call you and tell you I miss you so much. And...
translation.it: Volevo solo chiamarti e dirti che mi manchi tanto. E...

translation.en: see how you're doing,
how you and Dave are doing.
I don't know if you've been to Kaylie's house recently,
translation.it: Non so se sei stata a casa di Kaylie di recente,

translation.en: but I'm in the area if you're around or wanna talk.
translation.it: ma sono in zona se sei qui o vuoi parlare.

translation.en: I would really love that. I--
Brooke, I have to call you back.
Kevin, come here, buddy.
Oh, my God. [sighs]
Come here.
Come on, buddy. Help me out.
Hey, Kevin, these are my nice pants.
Kevin! Kevin!
She's getting her baby.
Oh, my God.
Kevin, you Nazi dick!
-Sweetie, what's-- Wesley? -What in the world was that?
translation.it: - Tesoro, cos'è... Wesley? - Che diavolo succede?

translation.en: Wesley? Kevin? Let me--
-He's very violent. -Sweetie.
Sorry, I was trying to rescue your cat.
translation.it: Scusate, stavo cercando di salvare il vostro gatto.

translation.en: What's going on?
I know you're mad at me. And you probably don't want me here,
translation.it: So che siete arrabbiate e non mi volete qui.

translation.en: but if I could say something...
As I was chasing after Kevin,
I was thinking, why does this cat keep trying to escape?
translation.it: pensavo, perché questo gatto continua a scappare?

translation.en: You know, you're the best parents he'll ever have.
I mean, really, he has a terrible personality
and literally looks like Hitler,
and you guys feed him, and you love him,
translation.it: ma voi gli date da mangiare, lo amate

translation.en: and you look after him. And then it dawned on me,
translation.it: e vi occupate di lui. E mi sono resa conto:

translation.en: I'm Kevin.
What? I...
I'm flawed and I'm complicated
and maybe even a little broken,
but you guys love me without judgment.
translation.it: ma voi mi amate senza giudicarmi.

translation.en: I think I just felt like I was falling behind, and...
if only I got my dude, I'd be okay. But--
translation.it: Con un uomo, sarei stata bene, ma...

translation.en: -I get that. -I get that.
I don't need a dude to be okay.
-And that has to do with the two of you. -Yeah.
translation.it: - Perché ci siete voi due. - Sì.

translation.en: And, much like Kevin, I feel like I've taken you for granted.
translation.it: E, proprio come Kevin, sento di avervi dato per scontate.

translation.en: -Yeah. -Mm-hmm.
So, I'm sorry.
Sorry?
-Was-- Did she say, "I'm sorry"? -I couldn't hear.
I'm so sorry. I'm...
begging you to forgive me. [sighs]
And I know that was a lot.
translation.it: So che è stato un po' invadente.

translation.en: Ma'am, you must be so lost.
Please know that Kaylie and Tad
are gonna take such good care of your baby.
translation.it: si prenderanno cura del suo bambino.

translation.en: Hey, Wesley, this is Noelle Grey from Coldwell Banker.
translation.it: Ehi, Wesley, lei è Noelle Grey della banca Coldwell.

translation.en: -Putting the house on the market. -Just selling the house.
translation.it: - Vendiamo. - Sto solo vendendo la casa.

translation.en: I had a completely different narrative in my mind.
translation.it: Mi ero fatta tutta un'altra storia.

translation.en: Oh, my--
Hi. [chuckles] How are you?
Uh, hey. Um...
-You look great. -Thanks. So do you.
-What are you doing here? -I was looking at your Instagram.
translation.it: - Che ci fai qui? - Stavo guardando il tuo Instagram.

translation.en: You posted where you were.
I know I'm probably not supposed to admit that,
but I'm trying to be honest and own my eccentricities.
translation.it: ma cerco di essere onesta e accettare le mie eccentricità.

translation.en: -Right. -And I thought I would come say hi.
translation.it: - Giusto. - Così ho pensato di passare a salutarti.

translation.en: -Yeah, cool. -Where are your friends?
translation.it: - Bene. - Dove sono i tuoi amici?

translation.en: -Um, where are my friends? -Oh, my God.
This isn't a bad time, is it?
Yeah, you know, a little bit. I--
-Oh, hi. -Oh, shoot.
-What's this? Are we speed dating? -No. Um...
translation.it: - Che cos'è? Uno speed dating? - No.

translation.en: This is Wesley.
-Wesley-- we're old friends. -Yeah.
-And, this is Ellen, my... -Blind date.
translation.it: - E questa è Ellen, il mio... - Appuntamento al buio.

translation.en: -Yeah, that's pretty much-- -It's weird to say out loud.
translation.it: - Sì. - È strano dirlo ad alta voce.

translation.en: -Yeah, someone set us up. -Oh, my gosh.
That's so awesome.
-Awesome. -She was like, "I know this nice guy."
And I was like, "Okay. I'm not doing anything [chuckles] on a Wednesday." So...
It's going okay. I'm talking too much. This feels weird. So--
translation.it: Ok, sto parlando troppo. È un po' strano.

translation.en: -Do you-- You should sit down. -No, no, no.
I should call my mom.
Her basement flooded yesterday, so I should check on her.
translation.it: Ieri la sua cantina si è allagata, quindi devo sentirla.

translation.en: -Oh, no. -You guys, sit.
You haven't seen each other in a long time.
I hope her mom figures that out.
Listen, I won't stay long. Um...
I owe you a big thank-you.
You recommended me for that Atwater job. Is that true?
translation.it: Mi hai raccomandato alla Atwater. È vero?

translation.en: -This is true. -Thank you. I got it.
translation.it: - È vero. - Grazie. Mi hanno preso.

translation.en: -I know. I know. -[chuckles]
Look, it's not a big deal. People come to me asking for guidance counselor recommendations all the time.
translation.it: Non è un gran cosa. Mi chiedono sempre se conosco consulenti.

translation.en: Oh, they do?
Well, guidance counselors, drug dealers. Those two.
Thanks for recommending me for the first.
-Yes, I did. Yeah. -I will try to not get fired.
translation.it: - Sì. - Cercherò di non farmi licenziare.

translation.en: If you do, you can be a drug dealer.
-Oh, yay. -Yeah. [laughs]
[chuckles] You got options, girl.
-Oh, man. It's so good to see you. -Yeah, you too. Well...
translation.it: - Oh, è bello vederti. - Sì, anche per me.

translation.en: Um, listen, I wanna say something, and I know this is weird
'cause you're very much on a date right now, but, um...
translation.it: perché sei nel mezzo di un appuntamento, ma...

translation.en: I like you.
And I know I was hung up on Jared, but that's not my guy.
translation.it: E so che ero presa da Jared, ma non è il mio tipo.

translation.en: And I feel like I'm myself around you.
translation.it: E mi sento me stessa con te.

translation.en: What if we just...
What if we gave it a shot?
I like you too. I...
But?
Wes, I don't think I'm-- I don't think I'm there.
translation.it: Wes, non credo di essere pronto.

translation.en: You're literally on a date right now.
This is casual.
What we had in Mexico was real.
translation.it: Quello che avevamo in Messico era vero.

translation.en: You would be more than just a date.
translation.it: Tu saresti più di un semplice appuntamento.

translation.en: You see, you deserve somebody that's gonna sweep you off your feet.
translation.it: Vedi, ti meriti qualcuno che ti faccia volare.

translation.en: Am I able to be that person again?
I wanna say that I am, but honestly...
translation.it: Vorrei dire di sì, ma sinceramente...

translation.en: [smack lips] I just, I just don't know.
Okay, I'm sorry I interrupted.
-Thanks, Sean. -Wes.
Hey.
So...
basement's okay, but my brother's missing.
translation.it: La cantina è a posto, ma mio fratello è scomparso.

translation.en: I'm sorry. What? [chuckles]
Like, on a date.
-[sighs] -Wes.
Look...
I wasn't supposed to meet somebody so fast. You know? I was... just getting my feet wet.
translation.it: Non volevo vedere qualcuno così presto. Mi stavo esercitando.

translation.en: Oh, my God. You don't need to say that. [chuckles]
translation.it: Oh, mio Dio. Non c'è bisogno.

translation.en: I-- honestly, it's fine. I'm fine.
That's the thing, Wes. I'm not okay with just being fine.
translation.it: È questo il punto, Wes. Non mi basta essere a posto.

translation.en: I want more than that. I wanna be...
crashed out on the side of the road, yelling at a bitch-ass goat...
translation.it: sul ciglio di una strada, a urlare a una capra stronza

translation.en: with you.
I wanna watch you dancing, you know?
Like you have nerve damage.
Wes, you are messy...
and complicated...
and so perfectly you.
And I haven't felt like this in a long time,
translation.it: Non mi sento così da tempo

translation.en: and I don't want it to end.
Me neither, Sean.
Wesley Darya...
will you marry me?
-What? -What?
No, I don't wanna marry you, but I would like to date you.
translation.it: No, non voglio sposarti, ma vorrei uscire con te.

translation.en: Why do you think I'm here? I've been thinking about you ever--
translation.it: Perché credi che sia qui? Ti penso da...

translation.en: Shit.
Hey.
Yeah, no, the blind date's not going good.
translation.it: No, l'appuntamento al buio non va bene.

translation.en: 'Cause he's kissing another girl on the street.
translation.it: Perché bacia un'altra ragazza per strada.

translation.en: I'm serious. Why does this keep happening to me?
translation.it: Sul serio. Perché mi va sempre così?
